key.name: temperature-unit
key.description: Choose the unit system for temperatures etc. Allowed values are 'Celsius' or 'Fahrenheit'.

key.name: woeid
key.description: Set the Yahoo location ID (aka. WOEID, Where On Earth Identifier), which is used to retrieve the corresponding weather+forecast information.

key.name: location-label-override
key.description: Optionally, you can override the displayed city. This one is displayed instead of the one from the Yahoo service.

key.name: wind-speed-unit
key.description: Choose the units used for wind speed. Allowed values are 'kph', 'mph', 'm/s' or 'knots'.

key.name: translate-condition
key.summary: Whether to translate the weather condition
key.description: Whether to translate the weather condition. If enabled, the condition is translated based on the weather code. If disabled, the condition string from Yahoo is taken. Note: Enabling the translation sometimes results in loss of accuracy, e.g., the condition string "PM Thunderstorms" cannot be expressed in terms of weather codes.

key.name: use-symbolic-icons
key.description: Whether to use symbolic icons instead of full-colored icons.

key.name: show-text-in-panel
key.summary: Whether to show the text in the panel.
key.description: Whether to show the weather condition text (aka. comment) together with the temperature in the panel (requires restart). If only weather condition text is undesired, consider show-comment-in-panel option.

key.name: show-comment-in-panel
key.summary: Whether to show the comment in the panel.
key.description: Whether to show the comment (aka. weather condition text, e.g. "Windy", "Clear") in the panel. Note that the temperature is still shown (if undesired, consider show-text-in-panel option).

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: The interval in seconds to refresh the weather information.
